verses.verse: And the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, even for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>: and their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> was in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
And they had for their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>, or <S%H7652>Sheba<s%>, and <S%H4137>Moladah<s%>,
and <S%H2705>Hazar-shual<s%>, and <S%H1088>Balah<s%>, and <S%H6107>Ezem<s%>,
and <S%H513>Eltolad<s%>, and <S%H1329>Bethul<s%>, and <S%H2767>Hormah<s%>,
and <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%>, and <S%H1024>Beth-marcaboth<s%>, and <S%H2701>Hazar-susah<s%>,
and <S%H1034>Beth-lebaoth<s%>, and <S%H8287>Sharuhen<s%>; <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>:
Ain <S%H5871><s%>, <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%>, and <S%H6281>Ether<s%>, and <S%H6228>Ashan<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>:

and all the <S%H2691>villages<s%> that were round <S%H5439>about<s%> these <S%H5892>cities<s%> to <S%H1192>Baalath-beer<s%>, <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%>. This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

Out of the <S%H2256>part<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>; for the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was too <S%H7227>much<s%> for <S%H1121>them<s%>: therefore the children of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> had <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of their <S%H5157>inheritance<s%>.

And the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> was unto <S%H8301>Sarid<s%>;

and their <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>, even to <S%H4831>Maralah<s%>, and <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H1708>Dabbesheth<s%>; and it <S%H6293>reached<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3362>Jokneam<s%>;

and it <S%H7725>turned<s%> from <S%H8301>Sarid<s%> <S%H6924>eastward<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%> unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3696>Chisloth-tabor<s%>; and it went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H1705>Daberath<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3309>Japhia<s%>;

and from thence it passed <S%H5674>along<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> to <S%H1662>Gath-hepher<s%>, to <S%H6278>Eth-kazin<s%>; and it went <S%H3318>out<s%> at <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> which stretcheth unto <S%H5269>Neah<s%>;

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> about it on the <S%H6828>north<s%> to <S%H2615>Hannathon<s%>; and the <S%H8444>goings<s%> out thereof were at the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H3317>Iphtah-el<s%>;

and <S%H7005>Kattath<s%>, and <S%H5096>Nahalal<s%>, and <S%H8110>Shimron<s%>, and <S%H3030>Idalah<s%>, and <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%>: <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.
This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.
The <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, even for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.
And their <S%H1366>border<s%> was unto <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>, and <S%H3694>Chesulloth<s%>, and <S%H7766>Shunem<s%>,
and <S%H2663>Hapharaim<s%>, and <S%H7866>Shion<s%>, and <S%H588>Anaharath<s%>,
and <S%H7245>Rabbith<s%>, and <S%H7191>Kishion<s%>, and <S%H77>Ebez<s%>,
and <S%H7432>Remeth<s%>, and <S%H5873>Engannim<s%>, and <S%H5876>En-haddah<s%>, and <S%H1048>Beth-pazzez<s%>,

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H8396>Tabor<s%>, and <S%H7831>Shahazumah<s%>, and <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%>; and the <S%H8444>goings<s%> out of their <S%H1366>border<s%> were at the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.
And the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.
And their <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H2520>Helkath<s%>, and <S%H2482>Hali<s%>, and <S%H991>Beten<s%>, and <S%H407>Achshaph<s%>,
and <S%H487>Allammelech<s%>, and <S%H6008>Amad<s%>, and <S%H4861>Mishal<s%>; and it <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>, and to <S%H7884>Shihor-libnath<s%>;

and it <S%H7725>turned<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%> to <S%H1016>Beth-dagon<s%>, and <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, and to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H3317>Iphtah-el<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> to <S%H1025>Beth-emek<s%> and <S%H5272>Neiel<s%>; and it went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3521>Cabul<s%> on the left <S%H8040>hand<s%>,
and <S%H5683>Ebron<s%>, and <S%H7340>Rehob<s%>, and <S%H2540>Hammon<s%>, and <S%H7071>Kanah<s%>, even unto <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6721>Sidon<s%>;

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, and to the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> to <S%H2621>Hosah<s%>; and the <S%H8444>goings<s%> out thereof were at the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H392>Achzib<s%>;
Ummah <S%H5981><s%> <S%H663>also<s%>, and Aphek, and <S%H7340>Rehob<s%>: <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

The <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, even for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And their <S%H1366>border<s%> was from <S%H2501>Heleph<s%>, from the <S%H438>oak<s%> in <S%H6815>Zaanannim<s%>, and <S%H129>Adami-nekeb<s%>, <S%H5346><s%> and <S%H2995>Jabneel<s%>, unto <S%H3946>Lakkum<s%>; and the <S%H8444>goings<s%> out thereof were at the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>;

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> to <S%H243>Aznoth-tabor<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> from thence to <S%H2712>Hukkok<s%>; and it <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%>, and <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H836>Asher<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%>, and to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> at the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%>.
And the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H6661>Ziddim<s%>, <S%H6863>Zer<s%>, and <S%H2575>Hammath<s%>, <S%H7557>Rakkath<s%>, and <S%H3672>Chinnereth<s%>,
and <S%H128>Adamah<s%>, and <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, and <S%H2674>Hazor<s%>,
and <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%>, and <S%H154>Edrei<s%>, and <S%H5877>En-hazor<s%>,

And <S%H3375>Iron<s%>, and <S%H4027>Migdal-el<s%>, <S%H2765>Horem<s%>, and <S%H1043>Beth-anath<s%>, and <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%>; <S%H8672>nineteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.
The <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.
And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> was <S%H6881>Zorah<s%>, and <S%H847>Eshtaol<s%>, and <S%H5905>Ir-shemesh<s%>,
and <S%H8169>Shaalabbin<s%>, and <S%H357>Aijalon<s%>, and <S%H3494>Ithlah<s%>,
and <S%H356>Elon<s%>, and <S%H8553>Timnah<s%>, and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>,
and <S%H514>Eltekeh<s%>, and <S%H1405>Gibbethon<s%>, and <S%H1191>Baalath<s%>,
and <S%H3055>Jehud<s%>, and <S%H1139>Bene-berak<s%>, and <S%H1667>Gath-rimmon<s%>,
and <S%H4313>Me-jarkon<s%>, and <S%H7542>Rakkon<s%>, with the <S%H1366>border<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H3305>Joppa<s%>.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> beyond <S%H1121>them<s%>; for the children of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3959>Leshem<s%>, and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5221>it<s%>, and smote it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H3427>it<s%>, and dwelt <S%H7121>therein<s%>, and called <S%H3959>Leshem<s%>, <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>.

This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

So they made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of distributing the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> by the <S%H1367>borders<s%> <S%H1121>thereof<s%>; and the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> in the midst of <S%H8432>them<s%>:

according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> him the <S%H5892>city<s%> which he <S%H7592>asked<s%>, even <S%H8556>Timnath-serah<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>; and he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and dwelt <S%H3427>therein<s%>.

These are the <S%H5159>inheritances<s%>, which <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, distributed for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>. So they made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H2505>dividing<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.
